      • encrypte

        private static java.lang.String encrypte(java.lang.String plainText,
                                         java.lang.String algorithm)
        encrypted password based on JCA algorithm of message digest
        参数:
        plainText - orginal password text
        algorithm - name of algorithm SHA-1,SHA-256,SHA-512,MD2,MD5
        返回:
        encrypted password
